data.title: 2024 Best Places to Live in Troup County, GA
meta_keywords: best places to live in Troup County
data.meta_description: Explore the best places to live in Troup County based on crime, public schools, cost of living, real estate, and local amenities.
data.text:
LaGrange

Town in Georgia ,

82 Niche users give it an average review of 3.6 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says It's nice but it's a small town so we don't have a lot to do when we want to go out. We have a great wolf lodge so that something but we don't have many good restaurants or fun activities. The mall... .

Read 82 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : B ,

Population : 31,173 ,

Town in Georgia ,

Featured Review: Current Resident says Hogansville is a rural city about 1 hour southwest of Atlanta, Ga. It is near West Point Lake, which is great for fishing. The city of LaGrange is 10 minutes away and has a very diverse and large... .
